Monetary goods like gold, silver, #bitcoin have value because they are scarce: supply/stock (e.g. btc stock 17.5m) cannot be easily forged and is not really impacted by a relatively low production/flow (e.g. btc flow 0.7m/yr). Thus stock-to-flow is high (e.g. btc SF=17.5/0.7=25).  https://t.co/uuZ1T11mCR
